pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Estimation of Measurement Error Models // Provide nonparametric methods for mean regression model, modal regression and conditional density estimation in the presence/absence of measurement error. Bandwidth selection is also provided for each method. See Huang and Zhou (2017) doi:10.1080/10485252.2017.1303060, Zhou and Huang (2016) doi:10.1214/16-EJS1210, Huang and Zhou (2020) doi:10.1214/20-EJS1688, and Zhou and Huang (2019) doi:10.1080/03610918.2017.1402044.
